Sentencas: This study proposes a curtailment-minimization model to investigate the potential of urban bio-waste to provide flexible electricity to a wind and solar powered Amsterdam.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: The transition to solar and wind as primary sources of renewable energy is hampered by their intermittent nature.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: Being controllable, biomass energy holds the potential of providing both renewable and flexible power.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: For the transformation from urban biowaste to electricity, a coupled gasifier and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit was used.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: An islanded microgrid for the residential area of Amsterdam was investigated on the basis of an average year, both in terms of weather and electricity consumption.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: The study aims at finding the optimal sizing of each component to provide sustainable and secure electricity supply.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: Security of electricity supply was guaranteed by ensuring a net positive daily energy balance while minimizing the total surplus energy to be curtailed during the year.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: All organic municipal solid waste (MSW) available was used representing 39% of the yearly electricity demand of Amsterdam; PV panels (20%) and wind turbines (41%) covered the remaining share.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: To this end, optimal PV and wind capacities of 186 MW and 165 MW were estimated, representing respectively 16.9% and 94.0% of the total potential capacity of Amsterdam.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system

Sentencas: In this study, the use of urban bio-waste is proven to bring flexibility to the energy system: using more biomass allows lower curtailment values.
Titulo: Urban bio-waste as a flexible source of electricity in a fully renewable energy system
